title:
Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit with Presentation Cradle and USB Kit, Black,
Compatible Devices: Laptop, Desktop, Power Source: Corded Electric, Usb Cable, 3 AAA batteries required.
descriptions:
Introducing the Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit from ZEBRA, a versatile and efficient scanning solution for various industries. This kit, presented in a sleek black design, is perfect for general-purpose use in retail and hospitality settings. The scanner is compatible with both laptops and desktops, offering a flexible solution for your scanning needs. Powered by either corded electric, USB cable, or 3 AAA batteries, this device ensures uninterrupted operation, even in situations where a power outlet may not be readily available. Featuring a handheld, ergonomic, and lightweight design, this scanner is comfortable to use for extended periods. The omni-directional scanning capability enables you to scan barcodes from any angle, improving efficiency and reducing strain. The device also comes pre-configured, making it easy to set up and use right out of the box. The kit includes a presentation cradle and USB kit, providing a convenient way to store and charge the scanner when not in use. The auto-host cable feature ensures seamless connectivity with your devices, eliminating the need for manual setup. In summary, the ZEBRA Cordless Handheld Standard Range Area Imager Kit is a reliable, efficient, and user-friendly scanning solution. Its versatile power options, omni-directional scanning, and ergonomic design make it an ideal choice for businesses in the retail and hospitality industries.

Features: - Compatible with laptops and desktops - Powered by corded electric, USB cable, or 3 AAA batteries - Handheld, ergonomic, and lightweight design - Omni-directional scanning - Pre-configured for easy setup - Includes presentation cradle and USB kit - Auto-host cable feature for seamless connectivity - Ideal for retail and hospitality industries
